Week 1 Google Doc

TUESDAY

  • Intros and class overview
    • Cat introduces herself and shows some past projects
    • Students add their own work and two websites they like to the  Week 1 Google Doc underneath your name
    • Discuss syllabus and define class expectations
    • Sign up for  weekly presentations
  • Break and:
    • Follow steps in  Exercise: Github
    • Read  The Science of Waiting … and Waiting … for Your Page to Load  by Bryan Gardiner
  • Deploy  P1
    • Discuss in-class reading
    • What are all the things a ‘click’ can do?
    • HTML/CSS/JQuery demo for  50 result charrette

THURSDAY

  • Create 3 discussion questions. Include this in the  Week 2 Google Doc
    • I am a Handle  by Rob Giampietro
  • 50 result charrette
    • Develop and upload to your class site a single page website which documents 50 possible returns for your chosen action.
